title: Game wont Update. (no Connection Issues Riot)
body: Game wont update, gets stuck at 33%. Sound like a lot of people are getting this problem and the only solution riot can come up with is connection issues

replies.body: There were some service issues going on with the patching service during the time you created this post that were resolved later that night. If you're still having issues, please let me know.
Just disable AVG and drop your firewall and turn off all security features and then open some spam emails. Ez Fix
Dude i have the same issue
